review.title: “Family politics”
review.pros: Pros – It's prestigious in the niche. Cheryl is a consistently good designer. She hits low points like everyone but she always comes back. She is one of the few designers around who consistently delivers, year after year.
review.cons: Cons – It's a family business. It's charming in some ways but in others... relationships take precedence over professionalism.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be less personal. Don't retain people who are incompetent out of loyalty. Move them to positions where they can do less damage.
